brew.description: Since the summer of 2021, we have been brewing craft beer in the format of small experimental batches. In the future we plan to repeat successful recipes and develop new recipes.
brew.technology: In the experimental mode, each batch is made with a circulation of about 20 bottles of 0.5 liters and is packaged in bottles with a unique label.
brew.order: During the war manufactoring is paused

info.answer1: Organization, company, sect, brand, corporation, syndicate, lullaby, just a bunch of letters. Choose what you like best.
info.question2: - What is the purpose of EKNM?
info.answer2: Creation and support of initiatives, projects and developments in the field of science, creativity and business. Something else is possible.
info.answer3: The time of working alone is over and this approach is hopelessly outdated. Collaboration is more efficient and allows you to use more knowledge, resources and diverse views. We live in the era of factories.
info.answer4: Contact the contacts on this page and describe what you have to offer or how we can help you. Ideally you should know one of us personally, but this is not required.
info.question5: - What is EKNM interested in at the moment?
info.answer5: Designs, articles and projects of any kind that contain something innovative and/or creative value. A clearer framework doesn't make sense.
